title: White Dragonborn
entryLore: Descended from the feral and bestial white dragons of the ice-capped mountains, these dragonborn command the power of cold. They often possess a powerful instinct for survival and a predatory elegance, reflecting the primal and often solitary nature of their draconic kin.

traits.name: Cold Breath (White)
traits.description: When you use your [[breath_weapon|Breath Weapon]], it deals [[cold_damage|Cold damage]]. You choose whether the breath manifests as a 15-foot cone or a 30-foot line.
